doc:
Frederick O'Neal https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frederick_O%27Neal 0 Frederick O'Neal (August 27, 1905 – August 25, 1992) was an American actor, theater producer and television director. He founded the American Negro Theater and was the first African-American president of the Actors' Equity Association. He was also known for his work behind the scenes as a revolutionary trade unionist. Frederick_O'Neal ( August_27_,_1905 – August_25_,_1992 ) was an_American_actor , theater_producer_and_television_director . He founded the_American_Negro_Theater and was the_first_African-American_president of the_Actors '_Equity_Association . He was_also_known for his_work behind the_scenes as a_revolutionary_trade_unionist .
